attachments.title: Pi Network
attachments.text: Pi is a new digital currency being developed by a group of Stanford PhDs. For a limited time, you can join the beta to earn Pi and help grow the network.

text: The first video in that channel announces "passive income without effort". I'm not one to give financial advise but this sounds like A Very Very Bad Idea and I wouldn't touch it with a ten foot pole.

text: This guy isn't a co-creator, developer or anything like that for Pi Network.  That was just a video I found useful as an intro to Pi Network.  If you're ACTUALLY curious about Pi then you know what to do.  I'm abandoning this thread.

text: I don't know why I keep getting challenged in forums, chat channels, etc about my curious inquiries.  My brother has been in the IT industry for a over a decade and warns against the elitist almost "autistic" types that I would meet.  I didn't really take it seriously until I saw it hundreds of times and this is yet another example.  You seem so helpful in these other threads.  I don't know why I have to be the fucking salesman for Pi Network.  I was just curious if anybody heard or saw anything about Julia and it.

text: Like imagine responding how you responded in this thread to someone in real life.  Like imagine someone bringing up the topic and you blurring out "Ok And why is it actually different or interesting? "  You would get met with raised eyebrows to put it politely.
